title: ‘It’s a Buildup from Zero’: Upcoming Scans to Determine Tour de France Pathway for Remco Evenepoel
content:
Where's Remco? Soudal Quick-Step believe there’s time for Evenepoel to challenge Pogačar and Vingegaard in July.

Read the full article at ‘It’s a Buildup from Zero’: Upcoming Scans to Determine Tour de France Pathway for Remco Evenepoel on Velo.
author: ahood
